data.title: Commemoratives of Famous Women for
meta_keywords: Gedenktage bedeutender Frauen. Commemoratives of Famous Women.
data.meta_description: Die aktuellen Gedenktage bedeutender Frauen, täglich neu. Commemoratives of Famous Women.
data.text:
A list of famous women whose birthday or death occurred on this date. The information is drawn from the FemBio Database and is updated daily. If you would like to learn more about the individual women or about future commemoratives, please consult the Database.

39 birthdays and 26 days of death are related to today's date.
